name: Ozwomp's Voyage
description:
Ozwomp the crocodile doughnut has been invited to a party!

You must fly Ozwomp on a voyage through space and time! There are many wondrous things an interesting places to observe. Do not worry!!! No harm will come to you on this voyage!!

This is a meditative flying game that will appeal to those who enjoy exploring. As you go on this voyage I recommend you slow down and take in the sights and sounds.

The game can be completed in under 10 minutes, but take more than that; its better this voyage lasts much longer; spend your time swooping through the stars, who knows what your life will bring when you're done.

Requirements:

This game requires a computer mouse to play, and a somewhat powerful gaming PC/Mac is recommended; this will not run on a low end laptop :(

More Info:

This game features music by Siddhartha Corsus which can be found here!

I hope you have an excellent voyage and share it with your friends; if you do enjoy your time with Ozowmp, please consider making a donation towards future games :^)
